item.description: This blog post is a tutorial on how to upload collection descriptors in the Global Registry of Scientific Collections (GRSciColl). If you are someone working with a physical collection or work with people who do, you might be interested in making these collections findable. Ideally, the content of these collections would be digitized and made available online on relevant platforms like GBIF.org, iDigBio.org, ALA.org.au, etc. Sharing digital specimen records is a great way to ensure the discoverability of collection content.

item.title: The Global Registry of Scientific Collections (GRSciColl) in 2021
item.description: The Global Registry of Scientific Collections, also known as GRSciColl, has been available on GBIF.org since 2019 but it recently got some more attention when we connected it to GBIF occurrences.
